import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CookieService } from 'ngx-cookie-service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { Username: string; constructor(private cookieService: CookieService) { this.Username = this.cookieService.get('username'); } } Department of Post Office Agent
